Name: Ritz Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized orange zest twist (flamed).
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Citrus freshness with a brandy backbone lightened and dried with a splash of brut fizz.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dale DeGroff in New York City and first published in his 2002 book The Craft Of The Cocktail , where he says, "This is my tribute to the Ritz cocktails of Paris and Madrid."
Nutrition: One serving of Ritz Cocktail contains 160 calories
